lead_paragraph: Magnus Moan of Norway won a Nordic combined World Cup event in Oberhof, Germany, edging Bill Demong of the United States by one-tenth of a second in a photo finish. Moan finished the 15-kilometer cross-country race in 40 minutes 8.8 seconds.
snippet: Magnus Moan of Norway won a Nordic combined World Cup event in Oberhof, Germany, edging Bill Demong of the United States by one-tenth of a second in a photo finish. Moan finished the 15-kilometer cross-country race in 40 minutes 8.8 seconds.
